Privacy Policy - HTMLCSSJS.org | Your Privacy Matters

Privacy Policy

At HTMLCSSJS.org, your privacy is important to us. We are committed to protecting any information you provide while using our services.

Information We Collect

We do not collect personal data such as your name, email address, or phone number. Our tools operate entirely on your local browser without sending your input to any external server.

Usage Data

We may collect basic, non-identifiable information automatically, such as:

  • Browser type and version
  • Device type (desktop, tablet, mobile)
  • Anonymous usage statistics (via analytics services)

This data helps us understand user behavior and improve our website’s performance, but it does not personally identify you.

Cookies

We may use essential cookies for the basic functionality of the website. These cookies do not collect personal information. Third-party services, like analytics providers, may also use cookies subject to their own privacy policies.

Third-Party Services

We may use third-party services, such as Google Analytics and Google AdSense, to analyze website traffic and display advertisements. These services may collect information according to their own privacy policies.

Data Security

We implement reasonable security measures to protect the integrity and confidentiality of your data. However, no online transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

Effective Date: May 6, 2025
